revised_title: New Compounds and Reactions of Allylic Alcohol and its Homologues
tldr: The author investigates the synthesis and properties of new compounds derived from allylic alcohol and its homologues, including allylamine, diallylamine, triallylamine, and the oxide of tetrallylammonium. The study also explores the reactions and oxidation processes of these compounds, with implications for the broader field of organic chemistry.
